cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Private individual single POD in a 8Pod share room for solo traveler. Featuring safe & secure lockable storage, king single mattress with USB & power points, in-built ventilation. Free Wi-Fi and access to shared kitchen, bathroom & laundry facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Donâ€™t mind bunking with your pals? Check out our Quad room that comes fully equipped with a bathroom, Smart TV and aircon. This room sleeps four and is furnished with a Queen bed and a set of bunk beds. Perfect for mates you picked up on your travels.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
